body_html: I ran into the same issue with my slightly customized docker file. Did all the libcuda symlink and LD_LIBRARY_PATH override stuff. Nothing worked until I added --action_env=LD_LIBRARY_PATH=/usr/local/cuda/lib64/stubs:${LD_LIBRARY_PATH} to bazel build option. So for some reason the LD_LIBRARY_PATH environment variable is not honored in the build process? I haven't had time to dig into this yet, anyone know what's the purpose of action_env?
